mapper.select: select m.*, s.student_name as studentName,s2.staff_name as staffName from module m left join student_module sm on sm.module_id = sm.module_id left join student s on s.student_id = sm.student_id left join staff_module sm2 on sm2.module_id = sm.module_id left join staff s2 on s2.staff_id = sm2.staff_id where sm.student_id = #{studentId}
